page.title: 06Industry in Wembley
page.content:
In our block there are quite a lot of small factories in 4 main areas, Perivale,Alperton,Park Royal and the area around the Stadium. Many of them are either to do with the electronics industry or light engineering.
Some of them are very famous,e.g. {H J HEINZ Ltd}- makers of canned foods {GLACIER METALS}- manufacturers of bearings {RACAL}- manufacturers of electronic and communication equipment {GRIFFIN & GEORGE}- suppliers of scientific equipment {HOOVER}- until quite recently this maker of household appliances had a large factory (now a listed building).
